Name: Nursery Slime
About the game: Nursery Slime is an RPG game developed by Doubles Core (だぶるすこあ) and published by OTAKU Plan STORY The protagonist was an adventurer who standing at a dead-end. Because he had to return to his old business as his livelihood, he met a strange slime in a quest. The slime, which is brought his home, not only suddenly became a beautiful girl, but even fell in love with him at her first sight. ... In this way, the hilarious daily life of the loser adventurer and the slime girl began. FEATURES Classic Japanese RPG Happy and fluent pure love story Transformation system Ability training system
Meta Title: Nursery Slime: Oct 22, 2021, Doubles Core and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Nursery Slime? Check out the release date (Oct 22, 2021), developer insights from Doubles Core, and a complete game summary.
